JILI Game Jackpot Challenge

Home » Promotions » jackpot challenge

JILI Game Jackpot Challenge

The platform and JILI Game Company jointly create exclusive activities, participate in challenges, and challenge for the highest prizes.

Participating game company: JILI
Event time: 3-10 2024– 3-16 2024 (GMT+8)
Participants: All players
Activity statistics method: valid betting
Activities:
Complete the betting tasks during the event to unlock bonuses that match the betting amount. The more valid bets you place, the bigger bonuses you unlock. Go for the top prize.The cumulative bonus can reach a maximum of P19,582.

The turnover of the bonus is X3
The activity is limited to JILI electronic games
Achieve corresponding achievements to receive corresponding bonuses, and the bonuses can be stacked to receive

Terms and Conditions:
1.Only one account per player is allowed. No same IP address, Bank Account, and Contact Number allowed. Players who have multiple or fraudulent accounts will not be qualified for this promotion.
2.For those is already applied , you are not able to apply again.
3. My company reserves the right to revoke all bonuses given to any member if they are found abusing this promotion.
4. My company reserves the right to amend or cancel this promotion at any time.
5. General My company Terms and Conditions apply.
